resources.string: Oops, looks like you haven\'t added any functions yet. Try adding them via Calculator
In our particular case, we had to use Quine-McCluskey algorithm
Unfortunately, you haven\'t entered equation yet
To simplify given expression, we used Quine-McCluskey algorithm, using it in the parenthesis.
logic. is a mobile boolean algebra calculator. Based on Jetpack Library, it uses LiveData, Data Binding and MVVM pattern to robust your experience. In it\'s core lie boolean algorithms
Project is fully open-source. I will be happy to get any remarks and am ready to provide any information needed.
Looks like there is a mistake in your equation... We recommend checking it once again
Illegal function. Please, re-enter your input
Describe what went wrong and what were you doing at that moment
Please, choose a place, where did the problem occur
Please, enter your relevant e-mail address, so that we could contact you and clarify the problem
All text fields should be full
Before we start, please enable custom keyboard in your Settings: navigate to \"Languages and input\" and open \"Virtual keyboard\" tab, then enable \"logic.\"
After configuring the keyboard, you can begin your work. Tap on \"Enter your function\" part and start entering your function, using custom keyboard
After you entered your function, press the done button. Then press the \"Next\" button to open special page with answers
In the Solution page, press another \"Next\" button to view steps of simplification
To view functions, which you have entered earlier, open History page. To get info about their solution, simply tap on the needed function
In order to get more information about the app, open About us page
If you (very unfortunately) have encountered a bug or a crash, don\'t hesitate to contact us via Problem page
Showcase of usage of the app
